name: Moving Platforms
description:
This is a small demo for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 

The idea was to create a platformer where you can move platforms to make more interestings jumps, resolve puzzles and kill enemies. 

I don't like the final result, I think that I could implement it in a better way that match more likely with the theme of the Jam. 

I work alone using Unity and his default libraries.
